collectible.title: Bloom & Doom's Anti-Zombie Gardening Kit
collectible.subtitle: All you need to set up your zombie-repellent lawn!
collectible.text: A starter kit for your own homegrown lawn defense against the zombie hordes. It has a couple of seeds, useful information, a L.E.A.F. signal device to call for help, and a QR code to acquire more plants.
collectible.unlock: Finish a game with Solar Flare.

collectible.title: Fireproof Goggles
collectible.text: Solar Flare uses her own to avoid getting her own eyes burned by her fire powers, and as an homage to a certain Cambion as well. You, on the other hand, can use yours to protect yourself from fire, water, high winds, dirt, zombie bites... or to stall another turn on a strip poker game.
collectible.unlock: Beat Solar Flare during the day in an outdoors place.
